Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to both of us. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth every penny of its $800,000 value to you. We are offering this extraordinary opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an incredible saving of $50,000 compared to its market value. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
